data.title: Z) "Gone But Not Forgotten: A Definitive History of the Greek Section at Woodlawn Cemetery
data.meta_description: Greece genealogy. Research your Greek ancestors with historic election records, data, thousands of articles to help with your family history search.
data.text:
(Surnames O-Z) "Gone But Not Forgotten: A Definitive History of the Greek Section at Woodlawn Cemetery - Baltimore Maryland" by Nicholas Prevas, Parish historian - 940 Total Greek names transcribed

The book "Gone But Not Forgotten: A Definitive History of the Greek Section at Woodlawn Cemetery - Baltimore Maryland" by Nicholas Prevas, Parish historian, was published in 2001 by The Greek Orthodox Cathedral of the Annunciation, Baltimore, Maryland

---------------

There are 940 Greek names mentioned in this book and I have done my best to transcribe this information accurately. If you are interested in viewing this book you can try to locate it through your local inter-library loan program, or contact The Greek Orthodox Cathedral of the Annunciation in Baltimore directly.

---------------
